entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Leamington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.1°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
